member.name: M:GuidePlatform.API.Controllers.BusinessReviewsController.GetODataBusinessReviews(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: OData endpoint - BusinessReviews için gelişmiş filtreleme ve sorgulama
member.remarks: Bu endpoint OData sorgularını destekler: - $filter: BusinessId eq 'guid', Rating ge 4, IsApproved eq true - $orderby: Rating desc, RowCreatedDate desc - $select: Id, BusinessId, Rating, Comment - $top: 10, $skip: 20 - $count: true
member.param: OData query options
